extDesc.message: Obtain a Git command to create a git branch based on clipboard text or the current tab title.

txtInstructions.message:
Create a branch from selected text

  1. Select text on current page
  2. Click the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar
  3. A new terminal command will be automatically copied to the clipboard using the previously selected text

Create a branch from the current tab's title

  1. With no text selected on the page, click the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar
  2. A new terminal command will be automatically copied to the clipboard using the current page title

Create a branch from custom text

  1. With no text selected on the page, click the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar
  2. A new terminal command will be automatically copied to the clipboard using the current page title
  3. Edit the text in the text field and submit the form by hitting enter or by clicking the submit button
  4. A new terminal command will be automatically copied to the clipboard using the custom text you submitted

txtFailed.message: Could not copy command to clipboard

txtPrefixHelp.message: Text to prepend to branch's name

txtCommandHelp.message: Git command to prepend to the branch name

txtReplacementHelp.message: Text to replace symbols and whitespaces with
